name: Real Coach Bus Simulator 3D
description:
'Real Coach Bus Simulator 3D' is a coach driving simulate game that will teach you drive a real coach across different scenarios! Take people from a city to another, show them amazing places and landscapes. Open world map, incredible vehicles, wonderful interiors will make you feel a realistic coach bus driving experience! It's time to get on board and drive through the whole country! Enter the simulation world of bus driving! Get 'Real Coach Bus Simulator 3D' now!

Features:
- Open World Map
- Detailed Coach buses
- Help other coaches across the route
- Animated people entering/exiting the bus
- Weather conditions and day night cycle
- Realistic visual damage
- Steering Wheel, Buttons, Tilting and the awesome real mode with clutch
- Detailed Interiors
- Intelligent Traffic System
